page.title: 07POPULATION AND HOUSING
page.content: There is not a large population in this area because most of the land is used for {agriculture}. Therefore the majority of the population live in farmhouses.The rest of the population live in and around the small villages of{Ballynure and Ballyeaston. {Ballynure is the larger village with two small housing developments on the Lismenary Road. One is the {Downey {Bungalows }which was built during the 1950's and the other is {Toberdowney which is a recent development of semi- detached private bungalows. {Ballyeaston}has changed very little over the years, only a small number of houses having been built around the village. The first small development on the Lower Ballyboley Rd. is called {Dickeystown}and has 16 houses. On the Trenchhill Rd., at the top of the Main St., 10 new bungalows have been built.
